Text: Thank You. Hopefully we will see you next season.

thank you 
do you know if/when there will be another season of Spiral?
also The Bridge and Braquo?

Bridge S02 will be out later this year - Braquo S03 late this year or early 2014. No idea as yet when Hatufim S02 will be aired. Thats all I know at present. When I get them - I'll upload immediately for you all ;)
Thanks once again for the excellent uploads Snowhiter.
Many, many thanks for taking care of us with the entire series Snowhiter, very much appreciated by those of us outside the UK who have no access to the BBC and need the English subs - Thanks again.
Same as SheffGraph said.  Uber much appreciated!
Just watched 11 and 12.  Best series ever!  Thank you again, Snowhiter!
More thanks -- hope you don't get tired of them! Like the previous comment, I too am outside the UK with no access to British TV, so I rely entirely on uploaders like yourself for good entertainment.

Thanks again! 
I live in Brazil and this is the only way to get some quality television.
I was wondering if you were planning to upload the new Foyle's War series, which starts on Saturday night on ITV??? It would be great if you could ...
Thanks a bunch mate. Great work.
Thanks so much for this great, great series. And the good news is- they're going to make a 5th season.
This is a fantastic series and they're making a 5th season. Also this summer the US is presenting The Bridge starting in early July!
